text: Bhai...apna toh kya hi bolu....mujhe nahi pata tu kya sochta hai....par mere dil mai toh uss tareeke se established hai ki road pe campus mai saamne se jaa rhe ho aur hi hello nahi bhi kiya ho toh woh understanding hia ki yaar bende ke saath toh joh time rha tha iitk mai woh kisi aur ke saath nahi rha. Always loved you bro....kbhi tere baare mai do raahein nahi rhi hai dimag mai....jyada baatein nahi ki baad mai kbhi par joh ki thi first year and summers mai....woh bahut hai yaar tujhe zindagi bhar yaad rkhne ke liye....thanks for every funda you gave me till date..ğŸ’Œï¸ğŸ’Œï¸
author: Suraj  Meena

text: hahah funny bioğŸ˜†ï¸...good one....We haven't interacted much but for little time we did....I probably devastated you without a full stop ğŸ˜ï¸. I just want to let you know that I have experimented with different behaviours in different phases at my stay at IITK and hence my insta handle pyschic_experimentalist.  So when you got annoyed with me I was kinda in a phase where I used to tease people. I hope you understand that is not who I truly am. I think you would have noticed I never annoyed you after that. Baaki whatever time we spent together lib mai aur canteen mai....I enjoyed talking to you...Thankyou...Hope to meet you again in future, Have a wonderful journey ahead.
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Arey brother valorant nahi khele saath mai....na hi mile achhe se campus mai...Bhai It was great knowing you....you have been so good to me always. I have annoyed you so much in MSE labs kbhi kbhi shyd class mai bhi...bhai lekin shyd hi kabhi gussa hua hoga tu..I don't remember but once you said something...I mean you understood why I annoyed people and all shyd yehi tha....mtlb lekin joh bhi tha....you were the only one to ever think in that direction....nice meeting you brother....hope to spend more time with you in futureğŸ˜ƒ
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Bhai joh sabse close hote hai unhi ka memoir likhne mai sabse dikkat hoti hai aisa lagta hai yaar saath mai baat hi kr lete hai memoir kya likhna....phir bhi likhna hi hai toh....shi hai yaar bilkul mst aadmi hai....jyada duniyabhar ke chutiyape ki tension nahi hai tere ko...atleast bahar se toh aisa nahi laga....kabhi deep baatein apni hui nahi ya tune kisi se ki hi nahi hai shyd...baaki mai jbhib bhi bagal mai rhta hoon tu mst hasata hai....mai toh hmesha hi hasta rhta hoon tumhari chhotti chhotti baaton pe....par harami kutte woh grudge rhega hmesha ki subah tune uthaya nahi lode.... woh bhulana mushkil hai. Life mai aage badhna khush rhna sabko khush rakhna aur mst talent hai yrr shayari, wagsr ka toh majaa aa jaata hai â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Hi bhai....woah 43 memoir sabse jyada tere hi hai campus mai shyd hahahaha...kuch aur honge private walon ko add krke....apna toh yrr jyada interaction nahi rha hai....joh rha tha main woh 2nd year mai tha....yaad hai....India Film competition mai aur uske sivaay fmc mai chhotta mota.....majaa aaya tha yrrr jitne fmc mai tha....aur tu uss time ka part tha hence the memoir....chaapu toh tu hai hi no doubts par yaar kaafi helpful banda bhi hai....I guess you have some bits of everything jaise ki stud type launda, helpful, haramkhor, mastizaada(lol), padhai wala, creative, technical field wala, etc. I like this thing a lot....phattu kitna hai padhai ke regarding woh nahi pata mere koğŸ˜…....mujhe jitna yaad hai tu kahi bahar jaa rha hai na further studies ke liye....Good luck for that, have fun and I hope you reach great heights in future....1 crore ka iitk donation kiya tha abhi kisine tu bhi krega 10-15 saal baad ğŸ˜‚
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Bhai....kaisa hai....apni kbhi shyd jyada bani na ho....meri toh shyd volleyball mai kisi se na bani ho achii ek ke sivaay ğŸ˜›ï¸.  Par achaa tha volleyball khelna tere saath mai....bahut majee aate the yaar volley mai aur chaapu libero ban ne hi wala tha tu bas inter iit hi nahi ho paaya last wala ğŸ˜ï¸. You improved your game a lot we all could see it....felt so good when you would defend ball so gracefully <3. You were good constant companion with me at that time and I will never forget it. Baaki toh yarr mai toh shyd teri 4 years at IITK ka 0.001% bhi na hoon par anyone with whom I have spent even a day and laughed with is unforgettable.  Abhi itna hi yaad aa rha hai baad mai kbhi agar achee se baatein hui toh kuch memories fresh hongi hi....game mai milte rhna....Have a wonderful journey ahead of you !
author: Suraj  Meena

text: kya be chaman chutiye.....tere se toh baad mai nipat ta hoon mai
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Hi, we haven't been in touch much and I don't know what you think about me as a person(I don't really care what most people think) actually but maybe I want you to think of me as a person who I really am. Lot of Thanks for helping out Blue all these years. I am really glad you were there with her.  You are probably the only friend whose friendship she doesn't doubt at all.  Hope we could get to know each other more. Have a wonderful journey ahead !
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Hi dear, tere liye kuch likhna hai kya....aise hi baat kr lenge na kisi din aur aage bhi krte rhenge occasionally mai krega tere ko call.....waise bahut smjhdaar hai re tu. I wish you all the best for your journey ahead....give your best for things you love and pursue and never break down. <3 bye
author: Suraj  Meena

text:
Bhai....kya hi bolun...okay as I told before I know the times when I have been jerk before...but that day jab ladaai hui thi that was purely my fault....mai gussa ho gaya toh kaafi achanak se....waise mujhe kam hi khalta hai koi mujhse baat na kre toh.....kuch din hua bhi aisa....mere ko fark nahi pad rha tha tere na baat krne se par wohi cheez do teen mahine chali toh I missed talking to you normally. Sorry bhai....waise I like the fact ki tum hmesha hasta rhta hai except sometimes(mtlb hmesha nahi hasna hota lodu) . Mujhe bahut pasand hai log joh muskurate rhte hai....mere hisab se unko dekh ke unke aas pass wale log bhi bahut khush feel krte aur tu un logon mai se hai who can make others happy just being there.
Love you darling,
waise mere bot ka github readme bana dena bakchod sa agar mann kre toh aur channel ka poster bhi nahi banaya yaar tune :p
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Hi...ladki. It's been long since we have talked achee se. Yaar I just wanted to let you know that I have had my best memories being in Film Club and that you are there in almost all those memories. yaad hai na....summer mai film workshop....aur  nankari mai jaake ped ke niche shoot krna....aur bhi bahut kuch....I have never met such cheerful soul and being besides you made me happy always...mtlb kbhi kuch depressing nahi lagta tha tere saath baatein krta tha toh....I know you have different been through different phases but I have been introduced and spent time with only your joyful phase and I will never forget that. Thankyou for spending time with me....I hope you achieve great heights, Have a wonderful journey ahead.
author: Suraj  Meena

text: woahhh.....itne saare memoirs already....mera wala dikhega bhi tujhe...kaisi hai dude...been long time achee se baat kiye....I wanted to let you know that film club is the best time I had at IITK and you were always there in those memories[I want you to go through them while you read this]. We have worked together on several occasions and I will miss working with you further. Jyada baatein toh nahi ki thi I guess...par jitni thi majedaar thi....Have a wonderful journey ahead of you....<3
author: Suraj  Meena

text: kem cho ! rajeshbhai....Shooting films was the most memorable time of my stay at IITK and you were a part of it most of the time. Film making in itself is so much fun yaar....just want to say in my best phase at IITK you were there with me.....yaad hai na ganga bairaaj wala din....shamshaan ghat aur kya kya kiya tha uss din toh bhai.....Baaki apne technical interest toh match krte hi hai which got us connected first time...yaad hai...apni hall ki CC....mst tha yaar sab
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Oho ups bhai....mujhe laga nahi tha tu mera memoir likhega par meri list mai tu hmesha se tha jinka memoir mujhe likhna tha...waise toh criteria fixed hai mera kiske liye likhna hai memoir and you are a exception to that criteria...kyun hai exception mujhe bhi nahi pata....shyd significant time tere ko pareshaan kiya hai udhar. Chal taarefe shuru krte hai ğŸ˜‚ - areyyy kya chikna launda hai be tu....mtlb mere ko maloom tha phle bhi par penchooo abhi photos dekhi teri wall pe toh bhaisahab looks bhai op. I wonder teri bandi nahi hai ya tune bas kabhi bataya nahi itna poochne pe bhi... harami ğŸ˜’...waise toh uss din bata diya tha maine canteen mai tujhe shyd....apologies and all those...phir bhi bhai jyada pareshaan kiya ho toh dil se maafi....thanks for helping in study's before exams...also I hope I was of significant help to you when you asked about placements.....good luck bhai chaapu naukri lagwana...
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Bhai kaisa hai....bahut din ho gaye baat kiye....yaar tere saath aise bahut jayda samay nahi bitaya lekin jitna bitaya bahut achaa laga. Mera friendship ka concept bahut rigid hai....mtlb aise hi kisi ko aasani se dost nahi bolta par bhai tere ko dost bolne mai kabhi sochna nahi pada....dil se aata tha. Chaapte rh yaar life main....tune toh iitk mai bahut cheezein experience ki hai....toh stories ki kami nahi ahi tere pass agli baar milenge tab batane ko.....<3 bye
author: Suraj  Meena

text: areyyyy thanks bhai tune phle likh diya memoir....warna meri bhi phli line yehi hoti "kya likhu bsdk tere barein mein" ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Jinke kareeb hote hai unka smjh nahi aata memoir ki kya likhein par ab lekin mere ko mil gaya hai content jisko mai reply kr skuğŸ¤¤....hehe. Yrr bilkul apn toh bane rhenge contact mai....aur tum poochte rho aur seekhte rho always there to help you bhai. Yrr Shocking to mere ko bhi laga tha jab mere ko pata chala tha ki....hamra ek doosre ke liye.....pata nahi kab hua kaise hua....pakka kisi bhadwe ne kahani banayi hogi lab mai baithe baithe aur saala raaste mai mere ko bataya hoga aate hue. Experiment yrr batake krenge toh phir kya fayda rh jaayega...natural feelings aur responses logon ki natural conditions mai hi bahar aati hai. Par tere saath toh hmesha ek sa hi rha hoon jaha tak mere ko yadd hai. Hahah TA ko toh mai abhi jaake bolu "aur yarr kya mst din the lab mai" ek baar ko toh woh bhi haan bhar dega xd. Tu bhi dhyan rkhiyon khud ke aur mere paise ka bhi hahahahahha.....
author: Suraj  Meena

text: Bhai apna toh jyada baat cheet nahi tha....par jab bhi tujhse milta tha achaa lagta tha....hmesha khush rhna....aur kamyabiya chhoona <3
